name: Bldc-controller
body:
# BLDC-controller

This Brushless DC(BLDC) Motor Controller was designed and constructed for the vehicles which represented the [University of Lagos](http://www.unilag.edu.ng/) at the [Shell Eco-Marathon](http://www.shell.com/energy-and-innovation/shell-ecomarathon.html), Europe and Africa, 2014.  

This work was a joint effort between [@imohiosen](https://github.com/imohiosen) and [@demukpere](https://github.com/demukpere)

![David at SEM Johannesburg](http://res.cloudinary.com/siriusted/image/upload/v1481573362/IMG_20141026_120110_qczw5j.jpg)
[@demukpere](https://github.com/demukpere) answering questions on the propulsion system at SEM Africa, Johannesburg 2014.

![Stanley and David](http://res.cloudinary.com/siriusted/image/upload/v1481573368/IMG_20141023_070916_s426ts.jpg)
[@teliov](https://github.com/teliov) and [@demukpere](https://github.com/demukpere) taking a vehicle for a test run
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
